reviews.author: Ernest Skiba
reviews.review: Great place to live, close to mall, highway and groceries within walking distance. Surrounded by beautiful nature that really bring out the beauty of this place.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your review and your continued tenancy at the Twin Pines Apartments, Ernest.

reviews.author: Ethan Harlan
reviews.review: I've lived here for almost a year now and I have really enjoyed it. I share a 1 bedroom unit with my fiance on the second floor. We like how many windows it has and the beautiful trees surrounding us on all sides, and also we like the

reviews.author: Austin ___
reviews.review: Great apartments. Very nice, washer and dryer included. Granite countertops. Only issue is parking for guests. Pet friendly

reviews.author: Jenn Marie
reviews.review: Beautiful, clean, spacious, these places appear to be upscale living.
